description:
500 people signed up within the first month, maybe there's something to this.

Every where all you see is wine, wine, wine, well, what about Whiskey? Whiskey can be just as subtle and varied as any wine, you just have to take the time to learn to drink it. That's where this course comes in. Here you will learn all the background information that has to do with American aged spirits. Here you will also learn how to properly drink them. You will learn the history of Bourbon and other American Whiskies. You will also learn how to store what you have in stock and what you are saving for a rainy day. This course will inform you of everything that has to do with whiskey, even how to spell the word whiskey itself, because it isn't as straight forward as you may think.Â There is good information in this course, and it is worth your study. There is a whole world of whiskey out there, and you have the opportunity to jump into it.
title: American Whiskey for All
